entry.title: Week 37, 2025: Bug fix for object method hover functionality and ongoing Nix dependency updates
entry.content:
Summary

One PR opened for hover bug fix and ongoing flake.lock updates

Activity

  • Method hover bug fix opened by Ulysse to resolve missing hover information on object method calls, addressing a gap in hover filtering logic (#1553)
  • Nix dependency maintenance continues with automated flake.lock updates including Merlin and nixpkgs updates from @github-actions (#1437)
entry.summary: Bug fix for object method hover functionality and ongoing Nix dependency updates

entry.title: Week 36, 2025: Single issue reported regarding hover functionality in neovim
entry.content:
Summary

One issue opened about hover method call displaying no information in neovim

Activity

  • Issue opened by Thomas Refis reporting hover functionality problem where method calls display "No information available" in neovim despite working correctly with command-line merlin (#1552)
entry.summary: Single issue reported regarding hover functionality in neovim

entry.title: Week 32, 2025: Issue opened regarding diagnostic reporting failure in OxCaml compiler branch
entry.content:
Summary

OxCaml integration diagnostic reporting issue opened by Sudha Parimala

Activity

  • Diagnostic reporting bug identified in OxCaml compiler branch where server log parameters not being sent properly, preventing errors from appearing in VSCode Problems tab (#1548)
entry.summary: Issue opened regarding diagnostic reporting failure in OxCaml compiler branch

entry.title: Week 31, 2025: None
entry.content: Activity report for ocaml/ocaml-lsp - Week 31, 2025
entry.summary: Activity report for ocaml/ocaml-lsp - Week 31, 2025

entry.title: Week 30, 2025: One new PR opened for wrap-type-in-module code action with existing refactor work continuing through PR updates
entry.content:
Summary

New wrap-type-in-module code action PR opened with ongoing refactor work updated on extract custom action and query PRs

Activity

  • New wrap-type-in-module code action opened by Felix Prasanna to wrap type declarations in modules with type t (#1547), generating discussion about coordination with ongoing Merlin-based refactor engine work
  • Refactor extract custom action work continued by Tim ats with updates to implementation replacing broken code action with proper Merlin-based approach (#1546)
  • Refactor extract custom query development updated by Tim ats for corresponding Merlin command integration (#1545) with maintainer feedback on API parameters
entry.summary: One new PR opened for wrap-type-in-module code action with existing refactor work continuing through PR updates

entry.title: Week 29, 2025: Two draft PRs opened for refactoring extract functionality in OCaml LSP server
entry.content:
Summary

Two draft PRs opened by Tim ats for refactoring extract functionality with custom actions and queries

Activity

  • Extract functionality refactoring initiated by Tim ats with two draft PRs: custom action implementation (#1546) and custom query implementation (#1545), both targeting corresponding Merlin command enhancements
  • Code action improvements underway to replace broken implementation with proper Merlin-based approach, including test relocations and functionality updates across multiple files
  • Merge conflicts present in custom query PR requiring resolution before integration can proceed
entry.summary: Two draft PRs opened for refactoring extract functionality in OCaml LSP server

entry.title: Week 28, 2025: Single Nix build issue reported for yojson dependency failure
entry.content: Activity report for ocaml/ocaml-lsp - Week 28, 2025
entry.summary: Single Nix build issue reported for yojson dependency failure

entry.title: Week 27, 2025: Yojson 3.x compatibility implemented and merged, with one new issue opened regarding PPX error discrepancies.
entry.content:
Summary

One PR merged for Yojson 3.x compatibility after extensive review discussion about dependency management.

Activity

  • Yojson 3.x compatibility PR merged by Marek Kubica after thorough discussion with maintainers about ecosystem compatibility and dependency constraints (#1534)
  • PPX error discrepancy issue opened by Raoul Hidalgo Charman reporting differences between dune build and ocaml-lsp error reporting for ppx expressions with filepaths (#1543)
entry.summary: Yojson 3.x compatibility implemented and merged, with one new issue opened regarding PPX error discrepancies.

entry.title: Week 26, 2025: ocaml-lsp released version 1.23.0 with delegated outline generation to Merlin and yojson constraint fixes
entry.content:
Summary

Release preparation dominated with merged PRs for outline improvements and compatibility fixes

Activity

  • Release version 1.23.0 completed by Ulysse including comprehensive feature set with inlay hints, typed hole navigation, and improved diagnostics (#1539)
  • Outline generation system redesigned by Tim ats to delegate implementation to Merlin with enhanced precision for symbol positioning and selection ranges (#1529)
  • Yojson constraint compatibility resolved by Ulysse to prepare for yojson 3.0 support while maintaining current version compatibility (#1538)
  • OCaml 4.14 LTS support completed through upgrade process (#1536)
entry.summary: ocaml-lsp released version 1.23.0 with delegated outline generation to Merlin and yojson constraint fixes

entry.title: Week 25, 2025: FreeBSD compatibility fix merged for 414 LTS version addressing build issues
entry.content:
Summary

FreeBSD compatibility fix merged for OCaml 4.14 LTS users

Activity

  • FreeBSD compatibility fix merged for 414-LTS branch by Marcus Rohrmoser to address build issues on FreeBSD systems (#1466)
  • Discussion about LTS support between contributors regarding FreeBSD compatibility and future maintenance of the 414-LTS branch, with Ulysse confirming continued support and upcoming release plans
entry.summary: FreeBSD compatibility fix merged for 414 LTS version addressing build issues

entry.title: Week 24, 2025: Two PRs opened including 414 LTS upgrade and JS-internal ocaml-lsp work, plus ongoing Yojson 3 compatibility discussion
entry.content:
Summary

New PRs opened for LTS upgrade and JS-internal implementation, plus ongoing Yojson 3 compatibility work

Activity

  • LTS upgrade PR opened by Ulysse for OCaml 4.14 LTS support with extensive changes across 107 files (#1536)
  • JS-internal ocaml-lsp experimental PR opened by Bryce Wiedenbeck approximating internal LSP for external tools with massive codebase modifications (#1537)
  • Yojson 3 compatibility work continued by Marek Kubica with discussions about release timing and backward compatibility (#1534)
entry.summary: Two PRs opened including 414 LTS upgrade and JS-internal ocaml-lsp work, plus ongoing Yojson 3 compatibility discussion

entry.title: Week 23, 2025: Repository maintenance request for branch protection after accidental push to master
entry.content:
Summary

Branch protection issue opened after accidental master branch push, extensive ongoing development with dependency updates and feature improvements

Activity

  • Repository maintenance request opened by Sacha Ayoun for master branch protection after accidentally pushing intended fork changes directly to the main repository, with suggestion to remove their write access (#1535)
  • Ongoing development work across multiple areas including request parameter refactoring by Mattias to standardize implIntf and inferIntf parameters (#1501), jump functionality enhancements by PixieDust for improved performance (#1461)
  • Dependency management with multiple Dependabot PRs for Dependabot updating @types/node (#1510), @swc/core (#1508), cachix/install-nix-action (#1504), TypeScript (#1494), and vscode components (#1426, #1425)
  • Code refactoring initiatives by Rudi Grinberg removing stdune cruft (#1403) and Sora Morimoto cleaning up dune configuration (#1418)
  • Protocol improvements including Ulysse working on DocumentUri converter usage in Merlin calls (#1429) and workspace symbols fallback enhancement (#1097)
entry.summary: Repository maintenance request for branch protection after accidental push to master

entry.title: Week 22, 2025: Dependency cleanup merged and multiple issues reported for inlay hints and semantic tokens
entry.content:
Summary

Internal dependency refactoring merged and ongoing MLX formatter support development

Activity

  • Dependency maintenance completed with Rudi Grinberg merging removal of stdune references (#1483), replacing deprecated module operators with inline implementations
  • MLX file support progressing through David Sancho's formatter integration PR (#1528) for ocamlformat-mlx compatibility, awaiting CI fixes
  • Yojson 3 compatibility work by Marek Kubica (#1534) and outline generation improvements by Tim ats (#1529) both merged in subsequent weeks
entry.summary: Dependency cleanup merged and multiple issues reported for inlay hints and semantic tokens

entry.title: Week 21, 2025: Bug report resolution and ongoing MLX formatting support with one new PR opened
entry.content:
Summary

New PR opened for MLX file formatting support and issue discussions around LSP internal errors

Activity

  • David Sancho opened new MLX file formatting support PR to enable ocamlformat-mlx for .mlx files (#1528)
  • Tim ats continued work on outline generation delegation to Merlin with ongoing code reviews and discussions (#1529)
entry.summary: Bug report resolution and ongoing MLX formatting support with one new PR opened

entry.title: Week 20, 2025: [Eli Dowling](https://github.com/faldor20) updated signature help bug report with additional discussion from [Ulysse](https://github.com/voodoos)
entry.content:
Summary

Ongoing discussion around signature help behavior improvements

Activity

  • Eli Dowling provided additional context on signature help appearing inappropriately in various cursor positions, with Ulysse acknowledging need for fine-tuning (#1162)
entry.summary: [Eli Dowling](https://github.com/faldor20) updated signature help bug report with additional discussion from [Ulysse](https://github.com/voodoos)

entry.title: Week 19, 2025: Small compatibility fix merged and MLX file formatting support opened
entry.content:
Summary

MLX file formatting PR opened while compatibility fix was merged

Activity

  • MLX file formatting support opened by David Sancho to enable ocamlformat-mlx for .mlx files in LSP context (#1528)
  • Merlin compatibility fix merged by Ulysse to handle new outline symbol kinds (#1527)
entry.summary: Small compatibility fix merged and MLX file formatting support opened

entry.title: Week 18, 2025: Fixed JSON serialization bug affecting signature help functionality through merged PR
entry.content:
Summary

Single bug fix PR merged addressing signature help crashes reported by user

Activity

  • Bug fix merged by Łukasz Kurowski correcting nullable option serialization that was causing signature help to crash with assertion failures (#1525, #1524)
  • Configuration discussion opened by Kate questioning why --fallback-read-dot-merlin isn't the default behavior, with Ulysse providing clarification on the flag's behavior and suggesting alternative approach (#1522)
entry.summary: Fixed JSON serialization bug affecting signature help functionality through merged PR

entry.title: Week 17, 2025: Two new issues opened discussing merlin fallback configuration and neovim setup
entry.content:
Summary

Two user experience discussions around configuration defaults and neovim integration

Activity

  • Configuration policy discussion initiated by Kate questioning why --fallback-read-dot-merlin is not the default option, with Rudi Grinberg explaining the historical rationale around stale .merlin files creating false bug reports (#1522)
  • Neovim integration troubleshooting by @rabiescow for enabling code lens and inlay hints, resolved through community support with Ulysse confirming plans for improved neovim support and Jules Aguillon being tagged for future improvements (#1521)
entry.summary: Two new issues opened discussing merlin fallback configuration and neovim setup

entry.title: Week 16, 2025: Two new user-facing features merged: combine cases code action and configurable diagnostic shortening
entry.content:
Summary

Two significant PRs merged implementing new editor functionality, one PR opened and closed without merging

Activity

  • Code action enhancement with Xavier Van de Woestyne implementing combine-cases functionality using regex-based pattern matching to allow quick consolidation of similar match cases (#1514)
  • Diagnostics configuration improvement by Xavier Van de Woestyne adding new configuration option for shortening multi-line error messages to show only the first line (#1513)
  • Code action cleanup attempted with Xavier Van de Woestyne opening PR to remove open related file code action but deciding to keep it after discussion (#1520)
entry.summary: Two new user-facing features merged: combine cases code action and configurable diagnostic shortening

entry.title: Week 15, 2025: Active development week with new inlay hints for function parameters and typed hole navigation features
entry.content:
Summary

Seven new PRs opened this week focusing on editor experience improvements, all successfully merged

Activity

  • Seven new PRs opened and merged this week by Xavier Van de Woestyne, all focused on enhancing the language server editor experience with features like inlay hints (#1515, #1517), typed hole navigation (#1516), and code actions (#1514, #1519)
  • Editor experience improvements delivered through better error handling (#1518), diagnostic filtering (#1513), and configuration options for inlay hints and error display
  • Code action enhancements including the new combine-cases functionality for pattern matching and improved destruct behavior with better formatting preservation
  • Review and collaboration process demonstrated through extensive feedback from Ulysse across multiple PRs with detailed code suggestions and feature discussions
entry.summary: Active development week with new inlay hints for function parameters and typed hole navigation features

entry.title: Week 14, 2025: None
entry.content:
Summary

Community support and troubleshooting with FreeBSD compatibility and installation issues

Activity

  • Community support activity included Rachit Nigam requesting assistance from Ulysse on jump-to-definition failures with Merlin "Several source files in your path" error affecting newcomers following OCaml setup instructions (#1187)
  • FreeBSD compatibility discussion continued with Marcus Rohrmoser providing detailed technical analysis of inotify header include path issues, receiving input from @jonahbeckford about /usr/local/include requirements for proper compilation (#1466)
entry.summary: Activity report for ocaml/ocaml-lsp - Week 14, 2025

entry.title: Week 13, 2025: Dependency maintenance week with [Dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot) submitting updates for @types/node and @swc/core development dependencies
entry.content:
Summary

Development dependency updates submitted by automated tooling with two PRs remaining open for review

Activity

  • Two dependency update PRs remain open from Dependabot including @swc/core upgrade to version 1.11.13 (#1508) and @types/node update to 22.13.14 (#1510)
  • Three dependency PRs closed without merging including @types/node updates (#1507, #1509) and @swc/core upgrade to 1.11.11 (#1506)
entry.summary: Dependency maintenance week with [Dependabot](https://github.com/dependabot) submitting updates for @types/node and @swc/core development dependencies

entry.title: Week 12, 2025: Dependabot opened four dependency update PRs with three closed during the week
entry.content:
Summary

Four dependency PRs opened by Dependabot with three closed for npm package updates

Activity

  • Dependency maintenance activity with Dependabot opening four new PRs for Node.js package updates including @types/node and @swc/core upgrades (#1504, #1507, #1506, #1505)
  • Package updates completed for @swc/core from 1.10.1 to 1.11.10 and 1.11.11, plus @types/node from 22.10.2 to 22.13.10 and 22.13.11 (#1507, #1506, #1505)
  • CI infrastructure PR for Nix action update from cachix/install-nix-action version 30 to 31 remains open (#1504)
entry.summary: Dependabot opened four dependency update PRs with three closed during the week

entry.title: Week 11, 2025: API consistency discussions and dependency maintenance with one issue resolution
entry.content:
Summary

New RFC for versioned capabilities, API parameter refactoring PR, and dependency updates

Activity

  • API consistency improvement with Mattias opening PR to refactor implIntf and inferIntf parameters for consistency with typedHoles request format (#1501)
  • Versioned capabilities RFC proposed by Xavier Van de Woestyne to enable custom request evolution without breaking client compatibility (#1503)
  • Dependency maintenance with multiple Dependabot PRs updating @types/node and @swc/core packages (#1499, #1500, #1502)
  • Issue resolution with Mathieu Barbin's destruct troubleshooting question closed by Sora Morimoto (#1301)
entry.summary: API consistency discussions and dependency maintenance with one issue resolution

entry.title: Week 10, 2025: Stale occurrence filtering implemented with package maintenance simplification
entry.content:
Summary

Nine dependency update PRs opened by Dependabot with two core functionality PRs merged this week

Activity

  • Eight new dependency update PRs opened by Dependabot targeting TypeScript 5.8.2 (#1494), @swc/core 1.11.7 (#1498), and @types/node 22.13.9 (#1497), with multiple older dependency PRs closed
  • Merlin integration enhanced with Liam Stevenson implementing stale occurrence detection to filter outdated symbol references from find references, rename, and highlighting operations (#1488)
  • Package configuration streamlined by Ulysse updating maintenance intent to use simplified (latest) packaging across all opam files (#1495)
entry.summary: Stale occurrence filtering implemented with package maintenance simplification

entry.title: Week 9, 2025: DocumentSymbol support for OCaml classes and methods merged, along with Merlin stale occurrence tracking improvements
entry.content:
Summary

Two merged PRs completed core functionality improvements while dependency update PRs were closed without merge

Activity

  • DocumentSymbol enhancement completed with Xavier Van de Woestyne implementing comprehensive support for OCaml classes, class types, methods and properties, resolving missing symbol navigation reported by Thomas Refis (#1487, #1449)
  • Merlin integration progressed with Liam Stevenson adding stale occurrence support to improve accuracy of code reference tracking (#1488)
  • Dependency maintenance activity with multiple Dependabot PRs for @swc/core and @types/node updates that were ultimately closed without merging (#1485, #1486, #1490, #1472, #1470)
entry.summary: DocumentSymbol support for OCaml classes and methods merged, along with Merlin stale occurrence tracking improvements

entry.title: Week 8, 2025: Modernization week with Nix infrastructure updates for OCaml 5.3 support and Stdune dependency cleanup across 14 PRs
entry.content:
Summary

Three new PRs opened for ongoing Stdune cleanup alongside nine merged PRs completing Nix modernization and infrastructure updates

Activity

  • Three new PRs opened this week continue the Stdune dependency cleanup initiative with Rudi Grinberg targeting List module removal (#1480), Int module cleanup (#1482), and complete stdune O references removal (#1483)
  • Nine PRs merged this week completing Nix infrastructure overhaul by Rudi Grinberg including OCaml 5.3 support (#1473), flake updates (#1476), deprecated API removal (#1475), and String module refactoring (#1479)
  • Dependency update automation continued with Dependabot submitting multiple @swc/core version bumps that were ultimately closed in favor of newer versions (#1469, #1471, #1472)
entry.summary: Modernization week with Nix infrastructure updates for OCaml 5.3 support and Stdune dependency cleanup across 14 PRs

entry.title: Week 7, 2025: None
entry.content:
Summary

Dependency maintenance with six automated PRs opened but none merged during the week

Activity

  • Dependency updates from Dependabot with six automated PRs opened including @types/node upgrades (#1470, #1468, #1464) and @swc/core version bumps (#1469, #1467, #1465), though all were subsequently closed without merging
  • Bug tracking continued for documentSymbol missing elements with Thomas Refis reporting that classes and class types are ignored in document symbol requests (#1449)
entry.summary: Activity report for ocaml/ocaml-lsp - Week 7, 2025

entry.title: Week 6, 2025: Single PR opened for enhanced jump functionality performance while multiple dependency PRs were closed
entry.content:
Summary

Enhanced jump functionality PR opened and multiple dependency updates closed without merging

Activity

  • Jump functionality enhancement opened by PixieDust improving code action and custom jump request performance by consolidating target queries (#1461)
  • Dependency updates closed without merging including @types/node bumps from Dependabot (#1463, #1464, #1457) and @swc/core updates (#1465, #1458)
  • FreeBSD compilation fix merged for 4.14 branch by Marcus Rohrmoser addressing sys/statfs.h header issue (#1466)
entry.summary: Single PR opened for enhanced jump functionality performance while multiple dependency PRs were closed

entry.title: Week 5, 2025: Typed holes functionality moved to Merlin with performance improvements for jump operations and new feature requests for inlay hints
entry.content:
Summary

One PR opened for enhanced jump functionality while several dependency update PRs were closed without merging

Activity

  • Jump functionality enhancement opened by PixieDust to improve performance by consolidating multiple queries into single request for code actions and custom jump requests (#1461)
  • Dependency maintenance included multiple closed PRs from dependabot for @swc/core and @types/node updates (#1456, #1457, #1458, #1453, #1455)
  • Code refactoring completed with Liam Stevenson moving typed holes to Merlin backend, approved by Ulysse (#1451)
entry.summary: Typed holes functionality moved to Merlin with performance improvements for jump operations and new feature requests for inlay hints

entry.title: Week 4, 2025: Routine dependency maintenance week with automated dependency update PRs
entry.content:
Summary

Six dependency update PRs opened by Dependabot for Node.js types and SWC core updates, all closed without merging

Activity

  • Dependency maintenance dominated this week with Dependabot opening six PRs for automated updates: multiple @types/node upgrades from 22.10.2 to various newer versions (#1455, #1454, #1447) and @swc/core updates from 1.10.1 to newer versions (#1453, #1452, #1443)
  • All dependency PRs were closed without merging, likely due to newer versions superseding earlier PRs or merge conflicts between overlapping dependency updates
entry.summary: Routine dependency maintenance week with automated dependency update PRs

entry.title: Week 3, 2025: Issue reporting week with bug reports for documentSymbol, search functionality, Reason syntax handling, and compilation error feedback
entry.content:
Summary

Three bug reports opened and one PR for typed holes implementation, with dependency management cleanup

Activity

  • New typed holes refactoring PR opened by Liam Stevenson to move implementation to Merlin codebase (#1451)
  • DocumentSymbol bug reported by Thomas Refis for missing class and class type elements in symbol navigation (#1449)
  • Search functionality issue reported by Xavier Van de Woestyne where search by types and polarity results lack proper location URIs preventing jump-to-definition (#1450)
  • Reason syntax bug reported by @7h3kk1d where local code extraction outputs OCaml syntax instead of Reason syntax in Reason files (#1448)
  • Compilation error fix completed for master branch issue reported by Sidharth Kshatriya (#1445)
  • Multiple Dependabot PRs for @types/node updates were closed without merging as newer versions superseded them (#1447, #1446, #1436)
entry.summary: Issue reporting week with bug reports for documentSymbol, search functionality, Reason syntax handling, and compilation error feedback

entry.title: Week 2, 2025: Project-wide renaming feature released in version 1.22.0 with OCamlformat upgrade and dependency updates
entry.content:
Summary

Two major releases shipped with project-wide renaming and OCamlformat upgrades, plus ongoing dependency maintenance

Activity

  • Version 1.22.0 released by Ulysse introducing experimental project-wide renaming feature that allows renaming identifiers across multiple files in both signatures and implementations (#1431)
  • Version 1.21.0 released by Ulysse featuring the new standardHover server option for clients to disable default hover provider functionality (#1441)
  • OCamlformat upgrade completed by Ulysse to version 0.27.0 improving code formatting consistency across the codebase (#1444)
  • Compatibility improvements merged for Merlin 503 preview enabling OCaml 5.3 support by Ulysse (#1386)
  • Dependency maintenance ongoing with multiple dependabot PRs for TypeScript and SWC core updates (#1442, #1443, #1440, #1434)
entry.summary: Project-wide renaming feature released in version 1.22.0 with OCamlformat upgrade and dependency updates

entry.title: Week 1, 2025: Dependency maintenance activity with Nix flake updates and Node.js type definitions, plus new issue on end-to-end testing for custom language servers
entry.content:
Summary

Automated dependency management dominated with four new PRs for flake updates and Node.js type bumps, three subsequently closed

Activity

  • Four new PRs opened for dependency updates including Nix flake lock updates by @github-actions (#1437) and Node.js type definition bumps by Dependabot (#1436, #1435, #1434, #1432)
  • Dependency maintenance completed with three PRs closed after failing CI or supersession including @swc/core bumps (#1434, #1432) and @types/node updates (#1436, #1435)
  • Flake ecosystem discussion around automated Nix updates with community debate on testing requirements for automated flake lock updates (#1430)
entry.summary: Dependency maintenance activity with Nix flake updates and Node.js type definitions, plus new issue on end-to-end testing for custom language servers

entry.title: Week 52, 2024: Project-wide renaming PR opened and build directory diagnostics issue reported
entry.content:
Summary

Project-wide renaming feature development and build directory configuration issues addressed

Activity

  • Project-wide renaming feature introduced by Ulysse enabling symbol renaming across entire projects with proper handling of function labeled arguments and functor parameters (#1431)
  • Build directory diagnostics issue opened by Moritz Hamann reporting incorrect diagnostic behavior when using custom build directories like _build_lsp instead of default _build (#1433)
  • Dependency maintenance through Nix flake updates attempted by GitHub Actions but closed due to CI concerns discussed by Rudi Grinberg and Sora Morimoto (#1430)
  • Development dependency update for @swc/core from 1.10.1 to 1.10.2 by Dependabot to incorporate bug fixes and documentation improvements (#1432)
entry.summary: Project-wide renaming PR opened and build directory diagnostics issue reported

entry.title: Week 51, 2024: Infrastructure improvements with automated Nix flake updates and dependency management fixes
entry.content:
Summary

One issue opened for polymorphic variant completion bugs, two PRs opened for protocol improvements

Activity

  • New issue opened by Kristof Toth reporting incorrect completion range positioning for polymorphic variants when triggering completion after backtick character (#1427)
  • Protocol improvement PR opened by Ulysse to use DocumentUri converter directly in Merlin Call Compatible params for clearer intent and better LSP protocol compliance (#1429)
  • Infrastructure work completed with Sora Morimoto merging CI workflow for automated flake lock updates (#1424) and development dependency fixes (#1422)
  • Protocol bug discussion around Merlin Call Compatible request params with Aaron Bauer closing PR after determining client-side fix was more appropriate (#1428)
  • Dependency management updates including automated flake lock file updates and legacy Babel dependency cleanup (#1430, #1205)
entry.summary: Infrastructure improvements with automated Nix flake updates and dependency management fixes

entry.title: Week 50, 2024: New standardHover configuration option and major development infrastructure updates
entry.content:
Summary

Seven new dependency PRs opened, four PRs merged including infrastructure updates and configuration changes

Activity

  • Seven new dependency update PRs opened by Dependabot including vscode-jsonrpc and vscode-languageserver-protocol upgrades (#1426, #1425) plus dune cleanup work by Sora Morimoto (#1418)
  • Development infrastructure improvements merged including CI workflow updates with flake-lock automation (#1424), npm dependency updates with Biome integration (#1419), and development dependency fixes (#1422)
  • Configuration and maintenance completed with dependabot configuration updates for new repository structure (#1421) and GitHub Actions workflow modernization (#1354)
  • Code quality enhancements through lint result promotion (#1420) and cleanup of old security-related dependency PRs (#1205, #1291, #1307, #1335, #1365, #1397, #1407)
entry.summary: New standardHover configuration option and major development infrastructure updates

entry.title: Week 49, 2024: Two releases (1.20.1 and 1.20.1-4.14) shipped with jump code action performance fix and new hover disable option
entry.content:
Summary

One new PR opened for hover customization, four PRs merged for releases and fixes, plus feature request discussion

Activity

  • New hover customization PR opened by Ulysse introducing option to mute hover responses for alternative hover implementations (#1416)
  • Two coordinated releases shipped with Ulysse preparing and merging release PRs for versions 1.20.1 (#1412) and 1.20.1-4.14 (#1413)
  • Performance optimization merged with jump code actions disabled by default to prevent slow codeAction requests, with new merlinJumpCodeActions configuration option for clients wanting to re-enable them (#1411)
  • Documentation improvement by Chase Johnson fixing spelling errors in README file (#1415)
entry.summary: Two releases (1.20.1 and 1.20.1-4.14) shipped with jump code action performance fix and new hover disable option

entry.title: Week 48, 2024: Release week featuring 1.20.0 with new custom jump request, performance issue identification, and dependency updates
entry.content:
Summary

Two merged PRs bringing major navigation features, three opened PRs including dependency updates, and two new releases

Activity

  • New custom jump request implementation merged by Ulysse from PixieDust's work providing Merlin-type code navigation capabilities (#1374)
  • Release preparation completed with changelog updates for version 1.20.0 by Ulysse (#1408)
  • Performance issue investigation opened by Ulysse identifying slow response times in Jump code actions affecting some projects (#1410)
  • Dependency maintenance with Dependabot opening TypeScript updates from 5.4.5 to 5.7.2 (#1407) and closing older update (#1390)
  • OCaml 4.14 compatibility prepared in separate branch for LTS version support (#1409)
  • Stale PR cleanup with old selection range improvements closed due to conflicts (#860)
entry.summary: Release week featuring 1.20.0 with new custom jump request, performance issue identification, and dependency updates

entry.title: Week 47, 2024: Stdune dependency removal refactoring with three merged PRs and six new issues opened including release requests and packaging concerns
entry.content:
Summary

Six new PRs opened for Stdune dependency removal work with three merged PRs completing path and dependency cleanup

Activity

  • Six new PRs opened this week including three active Stdune cleanup PRs by Rudi Grinberg: removing Stdune.Io (#1404), eliminating code generator dependencies (#1400), and removing additional cruft (#1403)
  • Stdune dependency cleanup reached milestone with three merged PRs: Fdecl removal (#1399), Path type elimination (#1402), and Nix workflow updates (#1388)
  • Merlin compatibility work merged with OCaml 5.03 preview support by Ulysse completing long-running integration effort (#1386)
  • Jump navigation feature completed by PixieDust implementing custom LSP request for Merlin-based code navigation commands (#1374)
entry.summary: Stdune dependency removal refactoring with three merged PRs and six new issues opened including release requests and packaging concerns

entry.title: Week 46, 2024: New type search API merged and issue opened about short-paths configuration
entry.content:
Summary

Type search feature merged after long development, new issue opened requesting short-paths configuration

Activity

  • Type search custom request merged by PixieDust after extensive development since September, adding 441 lines across 11 files with complete API specification and tests (#1369)
  • Short-paths configuration enhancement requested by Guillaume Bertholon to provide option for disabling path shortening in error messages, similar to OCaml compiler's -short-paths option (#1395)
  • VSCode integration mentioned by Ulysse with client support development underway for the new type search functionality
entry.summary: New type search API merged and issue opened about short-paths configuration

entry.title: Week 45, 2024: None
entry.content: Activity report for ocaml/ocaml-lsp - Week 45, 2024

entry.title: Week 44, 2024: Issue discussion on PPX environment variable handling with the LSP server
entry.content:
Summary

Issue opened and resolved regarding PPX environment variable support in the LSP server

Activity

  • PPX environment variable handling discussion initiated by Mattias regarding LSP server's inability to recognize PPXs activated through environment variables (#1394)
  • Ulysse provided clarification that no built-in option exists for this functionality, confirming the workaround of starting the editor with the appropriate environment variables set
entry.summary: Issue discussion on PPX environment variable handling with the LSP server

entry.title: Week 43, 2024: Installation issue reported for Ubuntu 24.10 with community troubleshooting assistance
entry.content:
Summary

Single installation issue opened with community response providing workaround solution

Activity

  • Installation problem with ocaml-lsp-server on Ubuntu 24.10 reported by Jean Pantaléon, encountering build errors during opam installation (#1392)
  • Community support provided by Pierre Le Scornet suggesting system OCaml package removal as workaround solution (#1392)
entry.summary: Installation issue reported for Ubuntu 24.10 with community troubleshooting assistance
